character.name: Sophie

appearance.hair: straight light brown hair, usually in a messy ponytail or pigtails with colorful hair ties
appearance.build: small for her age, typical 5-year-old build
appearance.distinguishing_features: missing one front tooth (recently lost it), cheerful curious expression

character.occupation: Kindergartener at a local public elementary school in Portland, Oregon
character.living_situation: Small two-bedroom apartment in Portland, Oregon with single mom (Kate, 32, graphic designer who works from home). No siblings. Has a pet golden/tan Syrian hamster named Biscuit.
character.transportation: Mom drives a used Subaru Outback. Sophie rides in a car seat/booster in the back seat.

style.school: Colorful mix-and-match outfits (striped leggings, graphic t-shirts with animals/rainbows, sneakers with velcro straps). Yellow rain jacket and red rain boots with white polka dots for Portland weather.
style.sleep: Light purple pajamas with white stars print

family.mom: Kate, 32 years old, graphic designer who works from home, single mom, warm and patient

pet.name: Biscuit
pet.details: Lives in a cage on the dresser in Sophie's bedroom. Cage has exercise wheel, water bottle, bedding, and small hideout.

notes.educational_context: This character represents a 5-year-old American kindergartener. Shows young child's daily routine, kindergarten life, pet care, and single-parent family dynamics.
notes.cultural_context: Portland, Oregon — rainy Pacific Northwest weather, coffee culture (mom), Subaru culture, green trees and nature, diverse progressive city. Small apartment living with single mom.
notes.pedagogical_goal: Help young learners relate to a character their age while learning home, school, bathroom, pet care, and daily routine vocabulary
notes.age_appropriate: CRITICAL: All depictions must be completely age-appropriate for a 5-year-old child. No mature, sexualized, or inappropriate content. Bath scenes show child wrapped in towel only — NO nudity.
